name: Store Manager Connector
author: eMagicOne

sections.description:
Store Manager Connector is a plugin, intended to connect Store Manager desktop software to your WooCommerce store.

Desktop software Store Manager for WooCommerce is a comprehensive solution with an ever-increasing set of features, focused on flawless user experience. Use the software to generate and/or translate descriptions or other data with ChatGPT, import/export products, customers and orders from any csv, xml, xls, xlsx file (local or remote or even with dynamic name), perform any mass operation like price increase, mass update, append, prepend or replace values, and much more.

Features

All about productivity! Store Manager makes bulk operations more approachable

  • Automate the product description, keywords or meta data writing process as well as language translation with ChatGPT.
  • Use Mass Changers to update multiple products (stock, price, dimensions, shipping classes, description and more), product tags or users in several clicks. Also perform any mass operation like price increase, mass value update, append, prepend or replace values, and much more.
  • Import / export products from any file (csv, xml, xls, xlsx, Google SpreadSheet file, both local or remote on server or Google Drive and even with dynamic name), without any requirements to the file. Keep your store inventory up to date, upload images, reviews or any other product data.
  • Import/export customers and orders, migrate data between stores.
  • Use POS, Generate invoices in bulk, update status from any to any, edit products in the complete order, delete orders and more.
  • Generate printable LookBooks or PDF Catalogs.
  • Sync with third-party systems like QuickBooks Online or Desktop, eBay, Amazon.

ChatGPT

  • Generate short or long descriptions with the help of ChatGPT from OpenAI massively.
  • Replace/Append information to existing product descriptions with AI-generated texts in bulk. Never run out of things to say about your products! Use ChatGPT to extend product descriptions, providing additional details, usage scenarios, and value propositions. Keep your customers engaged and well-informed, leading to increased trust and satisfaction.
  • Translate product description to multiple languages. Break down language barriers and reach a global audience.
  • Supercharge your SEO strategy with ChatGPT. Identify relevant keywords seamlessly. Add compelling meta titles and descriptions effortlessly. Let ChatGPT generate meta data that entices users to click through and explore your products.
  • Perform any other scenario. Request free assistance and eMagicOne team will guide you to achieve your specific needs.

Import and Export Tools

  • Perform product import from different file sources: local file, HTTP URL to file or FTP URL to file
  • Import products from CSV, TXT, XLS, ODS, XML or zipped files
  • Upload Category tree from CSV, TXT, XLS, ODS, XML or zipped files
  • Import remote (from URLs) or local product images
  • Export products and orders from grid to HTML, XML, XLS/XLSX, TXT, CSV
  • Take advantage of extended category, product, tag, users export via wizard with the possibility of field selection
  • Export/import orders and customers

Simplicity! Store Manager is handy and practical

  • Manage WooCommerce Multisite from one location
  • Connect to unlimited number of stores
  • Make modifications when you are offline and sync them when you are back online
  • Access and manage (create, modify, remove) products and categories within one page in Store Manager
  • Filter products by different criteria in the grid or use advanced search option
  • Create product variations via import or use one-page Generator to configure all the fields
  • Arrange files in Media Library easily – upload, edit, view media files without switching between pages
  • Add orders with Point of Sale (POS) system to create orders, calculate change and apply discount coupons
  • Use barcode scanner for brick-and-mortar stores for quick product search (by product name, SKU) and to complete orders
  • Print receipts using till printer

Analysis and Reporting in Store Manager

  • Take all the advantages of Store Diagnostics – a perfect assistant that allows to instantly detect and eliminate SEO and image malfunctions (missing images, products without featured images, duplicated URL keys, products without categories, etc)
  • Visualize essential statistics using reporting functionality – check sales within certain timeframe, analyze what products are best sellers and more

Safety tools

  • Database backup/restore option is an essential safeguard that allows you to protect data and minimize data loss risk
  • Automated backup of WooCommerce database performed on schedule

Success Kicking Addons

  • Automated Product Export for creating scheduled WooCommerce CSV data feeds
  • Automated Product Import addon – automates product import from external sources, synchronizes your database updates with your wholesale partner’s
  • Export and synchronize your WooCommerce products with one of the biggest world’s marketplaces with Amazon Integration addon, perform orders management
  • Generate printable brochures, flyers or lookbooks with LookBook (PDF Catalog) Creator
  • Export/import products from/to your store, perform synchronization and import orders from eBay in a quick manner with eBay Integration Addon
  • Integrate your store with QuickBooks software to export and import your products, export customers and orders via Quickbooks Integration plugin

Store Manager is a multilingual application, it comes with various localizations (German, Dutch, Italian, etc) and you can manage store in your native language.

Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress version 4.1.1 or higher
  • WooCommerce version 2.3.4 or higher
  • PHP version 5.4 or higher
  • MySQL version 5.0 or higher

Please note, WooCommerce Store Manager Connector is not a stand-alone product. It is used to set connection between Store Manager for WooCommerce and your shop database.
If you still do not have Store Manager installed, download free trial by this link

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our plugin from our official site with further uploading it to your web server via WordPress backend or any FTP client. Visit our documentation to find instructions on how to manage doing this.

Updating

After new version of WooCommerce Store Manager Connector rolls out, you can easily update the plug-in from backend. Version number and update button will be immediately displayed in the list of plug-ins.
sections.installation:
Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of WooCommerce Store Manager Connector, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Store Manager Connector” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our plugin you can view details about it such as the the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”. Follow these instructions
sections.faq:
Something goes wrong, how can I contact support?

Free support is provided via:
– e-mail – contact@emagicone.com
– chat is available at our website – https://woocommerce-manager.com/support-center/contact-us/

Where can I find public documentation?

Online documentation can be found at
https://woocommerce-store-manager-doc.emagicone.com/

Where can I request a feature?

You can request any feature at https://support.emagicone.com/690396-WooCommerce-Manager-Feature-Request
sections.changelog:
1.1.3

  • Improvement: The possibility to upload images from dynamic URLs when importing products has been added.

1.1.2

  • Fixed: Fixed issue with uploading images to the server during import with URLs containing extra symbols.
  • Fixed: Fixed issue with displaying the error message notifying that there is no access to the temporary folder upon testing the connection

1.1.1

  • Improvement: Implemented recommended fixes from the WordPress validator.

1.1.0

  • Improvement: Implemented recommended fixes from the WordPress validator.
  • Improvement: Now the connector settings are saved globally for all websites for the WordPress Multisite.
  • Fixed: Fixed issue with connecting to the sub-stores (for the WordPress Multisites).
  • Fixed: Fixed issue that occurred when the Connector was installed for a store on a local server.
  • Fixed: Fixed issue occurring upon posting large SQL queries.

1.0.12

  • Fixed: Deprecated code has been removed
  • PHP version 5.4 or greater is required
  • Stores with older PHP versions may not function properly if magic_quotes parameter is enabled in PHP configuration

1.0.11

  • Improvement: Add “use temporary directory in plugin folder” checkbox in settings. It will help with structure where wordpress core and wp-content are separated.

1.0.10

  • Fixed: Incorrect module version in Store Manager software

1.0.9

  • Fixed: Remove deprecations of code for php 7.4

1.0.8

  • Improvement: Added the functionality to work with files on the server

1.0.7

  • Fixed: Hotfix for module detection
  • Fixed: Initial installation issues
  • Fixed: Other minor fixes

1.0.6

  • Improvement: Add compatibility with php 7.1+
  • Improvement: Add compatibility with WooCommerce repositories installed from git
  • Fixed: Multisite compatibility
  • Fixed: Other minor fixes

1.0.5

  • Fixed: Sanitization of sql for version 4.8 and higher

1.0.4

  • Fixed: Sanitization of sql on connector

1.0.3

  • Fixed: Issues related to mcrypt_decrypt

1.0.2

  • Internal changes

1.0.1

  • First release
sections.screenshots:
1. Store Manager Connector Admin

  2. ChatGPT Mass Product Description Generation

  3. Store Manager For WooCommerce Main Page

  4. WooCommerce Product Import

  5. WooCommerce Product Export

  6. WooCommerce Mass Product Changer

  8. WooCommerce POS

  9. WooCommerce Bulk Order Update Status

  10. Store Manager for WooCommerce Preferences
sections.reviews:
Great Import Tool with ChatGPT Feature

By ievstakhii on November 14, 2023

Best plugin for products and orders import. Also a new feature with ChatGPT is mind-blowing!

Abandoned plugin

By labd12estudio on May 26, 2022

Would love for this to work, but apparentely emagic gave up on this plugin. 11 months without update, and it obviously doesnt work anymore. There's an error message even tho we do every thing the right way

Excelente Producto

By hameneyro on April 20, 2022

la forma mas sencilla de conectar tu sitio Woocomerce a tu aplicacion local de Store Manager Convierte tu sitio wocoomerece a una aplicacion de punto de venta local, puedes hacer cambios rapidos y sencillos (imagenes, descripciones, precios,etc) sin desgastarte en pasar revisando hojas y hojas de productos en woocomerce. Llevo 2 años con el.

Working great

By yard on November 9, 2019

Connected and working great, good product

Productivity

By johnfontyn on September 20, 2019

Store Manager is great for productivity, creating products and adding images is simpler and quicker. Backups, export/import much easier than other solutions.

Product is Impossible to Use

By thenewbreed on August 22, 2019

I have been trying for months on end and have literally never one time gotten it to work. First, it was incompatible with my updated version of Wordpress and Woocommerce. Every week there is another reason and all I can do is give up trying to connect this product. I would love to give it a real review but to date everything to do with the eMagic product has been a colossal waste of time.

short_description: Store Manager Connector is a plugin, intended to connect Store Manager desktop software (with ChatGPT) to your WooCommerce store.
